title: Star Wars WEG D6
description:
The other torrents for Star Wars (d6) by West End Games were all incomplete and/or not being seeded. I also noticed that the other big WEG Star Wars torrent (the one not being seeded) had some incorrectly labeled books to make it look like a more complete collection than it really was.

So, to remedy this, and to get these amazing old out of print books back in the public domain, here is my nearly complete collection of the original Star Wars RPG books by West End Games.

Note that there are a few duplicates of books due to me not being able to decide which pdf was better quality, so I just put both in. If anyone has any of the missing books, please make a torrent and post a link to it in the comments section.



***********************************************

Legal stuff:
This torrent is being uploaded and made available for preservation and culturally historical & educational purposes.

Preservation materials must not be bought or sold.

Fanedits and preservations are an artform and to be shared among legal owners of the officially available releases only.

Do not support piracy.
